products.title: Etched Vine, Fern - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll just fall in love with the delicate florals displayed in the etched vine fern. Think lime-toned mustard beautifully interrupted by gentle white and soft grey blossoms. The 100% cotton fabric folds sweetly into neat roman folds, accentuating the mild pattern of the blind. Add the fern to your home office for a colourful yet relaxing look and feel. Set against soft white or pale grey walls, and accent throughout the room with matching yellow tones, opting for clean, contemporary furniture and minimalist soft furnishings.

products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Mint Green Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their mint green - perfect for those wanting to introduce a bright colour into their room.

products.title: Faux Suede, Bottle Green - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede bottle green is a lightweight and easy-to-use roman blind consisting of a the darkest of forest greens and a gorgeously touchable suede-feel fabric. This deep shade is sure to add a moody, mysterious feel to any room in the home. The softness of the cloth soothes the darkness of the bottle green's colour, making it perfect for a cosy and warm living room. Team with dark or medium woods, with rustic finishes, and gentle fawns and oatmeals to tame the heavy ambience.

products.title: Wild Meadow, Pistachio - Roman Blind
products.description: On a taming cream base sit the wild meadow pistachio's watercolour-style florals, in vintage blue, muddy mustard, and gentle green, forming an artistic and creative vibe. When curved into the tempered arches of the roman, the pattern takes on a new, more scattered vibe, providing the look with character and personality. Hang the pistachio in your home workspace or art studio, where the soft colours will both calm and inspire.

products.title: Limewash Gloss Perfect Fit
products.description: A peppier take on their beige-toned blinds, limewash is enhanced by its high-gloss finish, for a gentle shine that gives a clean look to your windows. Fitting snug into the window frame, their perfect fit blinds are the simplest shading solution for conservatories, patio doors and 'tricky' windows like tilt and turns struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Scandi Birds, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: Brighter and more vibrant than ever, the scandi birds collection is back, this time in the luscious kiwi edition. Slate grey birds, detailed with lime and white patterning, sit on a bed of dark, vibrant lime, forming an eye-catching design that is perfect for the modern family home. Adopt a cool and contemporary colour scheme in your kitchen, placing the kiwi against white walls and including dove grey units and matching lime tiling.

products.title: Scandi Sprig, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: On a rich ochre base, the scandi sprig in kiwi places sweet sprigs of foliage in pale greys and off-whites, on brown grey stems. The look is pretty and festive, and the sweet illustrations are appealing to the eye. Craft a cheery palette in your kitchen by using the kiwi as your inspiration. Set it against white walls and grey kitchen units, accessorising with ochre tones in your appliances, utensils, and accessories.

products.title: Capri Vision Paradise Green Day And Night Blind
products.description: Give your interior a burst of fresh colour with the capri vision paradise green day and night roller blind. Bright and cheerful, this blind will give visual appeal to your space as well as being a practical and versatile option for light control. Designed to fully close for complete privacy or alternatively, it can be semi opened to retain a sense of privacy whilst letting plenty of natural light shine through.

products.title: Etched Vine, Eau De Nil - Roman Blind
products.description: Subtly elegant, the etched vine in eau de nil blends a pale aqua green background with delicate floral imagery in ivory greys and whites. The outcome is one of understated sophistication and will work as part of a classic dcor scheme. Mix the eau de nil with similar green tones in a living room for a relaxed and luxurious look and feel. Go for ivory walls and wooden floors, with a large coloured rug on top.

products.title: Maurice, Lime - Roman Blind
products.description: Build a space full of comfort and class with the maurice in lime, where a combination of fine, silky threads form a plush and downy blind for a luxury look. The reviving, muted green influence creates a fresh finish on lavishly textured cloth. Create a feeling of classic sophistication in your master bedroom by hanging the lime against walls painted in a soothing, silky satin. Draw out the hues of the blind by featuring olive, silver, and yellow hues in your bedlinen, rugs, and accessories.

products.title: Hedgerow, Pistachio - Roman Blind
products.description: Using a range of shades from the same spectrum, the pistachio, from the floral hedgerow collection, offers bright, contemporary colour. Tropical green complements bright teal, which accents soft duck egg, and so on, all tamed by subtle slate greys and gentle blacks. Create a tropical rainforest colour scheme in your master bedroom, whilst still maintaining an orthodox floral patterning as your base.

products.title: Celestial Sage Green Curtain
products.description: Inspired by the celestial trend this roman blind will add a reflective shine to your interior, the silky metallic fabric bounces the light of it beautifully creating a airier open feel. The divine shade of the celestial sage green curtain will transform your living space into a tranquil and serene area of your home. Selected from the prestigious luna collection to give you the sense that your window continues outdoors and beyond.

products.title: Alice Lichen Green Curtain
products.description: Any room will benefit from the classic botanical beauty of the alice lichen green curtain. The woven jacquard style fabric features a delicate design of white flora on a mossy green background. This take on a traditional design is fresh and elegant and in a vibrant colour that will really stand out thanks to a full lining. Product id: db-cur1165 fabric colour: lichen green material: 75% polyester 25% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes alice lichen green curtain in green.

products.title: Fiji, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: Rejuvenate and energise your home by including the fiji in a refreshing, muted lime green tone. This sleek blind is made from a voile-like fabric and silky, metallic-infused thread to form an elegant finish with vibrant colour and subtle texture. Revive a basic white bathroom or sun lounge with sprightly tones of lime, olive, and avocado greens for a stylish lift and a boost of stimulating colour, combining with metallic materials and accessories to elaborate the shimmering blind and create elegant continuity.

products.title: Paradise Willow Green Roman Blind
products.description: Paradise, a beautiful and special roman, the leaf style giving that bit more elagance. At an affordable price the blind would be wonderful in your house. This cream roman blind has a bold leaf print that will be a great statement piece in any room in your home. products.title: Coco, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: Offering a natural yet contemporary look, the coco in green is the ideal choice for an understated look in a modern home. The palest of greens and a pretty stone grey sit on top of a green-hued oatmeal background, with the leaf illustrations only serving to accentuate this natural style. The green will work perfectly in a kitchen that gets plenty of natural light - but even if it doesn't, this blind's light tones will help to preserve what light you have.

products.description: Splash vine green a bright and lush green perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous green blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.description: Splash pear green is a lush green perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous green blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Moss Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash moss green perfect fit roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. This soft green, perfect fit roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. Our perfect fit blinds are perfect for upvc windows where a screw-free solution is needed. Using sleek framework and brackets that slide under the window beading, their perfect fit blinds come in a wide array of fabrics and finishes to suit your needs.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Lime High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Lime is one of the most calm and natural finishes in the kaleidoscope range. With a premium gloss finish attracting your eye to this soothing shade of green you have the perfect recipe for combining functionality and style in one truly modern piece. We love the colour contrast when lime is placed with a range of light woods. It could be anything from a pine dining table or kitchen worktops, to a coffee table or a thick wooden window sill.

products.title: Nova, Lime - Roman Blind
products.description: In vibrant, fruity green, the nova lime is a bold and dazzling piece that will liven up any room. The bright hue contrasts nicely with the softness of the texturing, making for a stylish and innovative blind. Inject a sense of fun into a child's bedroom by combining the lime with playful, illustrated wallpapers in complementary colours such as navy and cobalt blues or lemon yellows and zingy oranges.

products.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Pear Green Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash pear green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Splash Moss Green Panel Blind
products.description: Splash moss green panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The light green, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Kent, Kiwi - Roman Blind
products.description: Luscious in lime, the kent kiwi mixes a light, appetising hue with a deep pile fabric with a gorgeous chenille feel. The thick yet lightweight cloth, lined with a protective polycotton sateen, folds neatly into gentle drapes to form a perfect roman blind. Add a calming softness to the spare bedroom by centring your decor around the kiwi. Keep things light and airy by sticking to white walls and white and lime bedlinen and cushions.

products.title: Kent, Green - Roman Blind
products.description: A rich forest green, the kent green combines indoor luxury with outdoor hues. The deep feel and soft texture of the chenille-like cloth adds a gentle shimmer to this dark colour as the light hits it from different directions. Combined with the sumptuous layers of the roman blind style, this is a plush piece indeed. Dress your dining room in old-fashioned splendour by blending the green amongst patterned wallpaper, dark mahogany furniture, and cream accents.

products.description: Infusion solar not only brings fresh varied colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight reducing harmful uv rays, keeping furnishings looking vibrant. Hang the pistachio against an ice white wall in your street-facing kitchen or bathroom, to ensure privacy without compromising on light.
